General.Name: VSBLTY Groupe Technologies Corp
General.Description: VSBLTY Groupe Technologies Corp., a retail technology company, operates as a software provider of artificial intelligence security and retail analytics technology solutions. The company's software modules include DataCaptor, a software module that leverages camera and sensor technology with artificial intelligence to provide real time analytics and audience measurement; VisionCaptor, a content management system; and VSBLTY Vector, a software module that interfaces with a local or remote database to detect persons or objects of interest within a camera's field of view. It also provides retail hardware solutions. VSBLTY Groupe Technologies Corp. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T5

4.Name: Mr. Jan  Talamo
